d: Hello, and sorry for the amateur work, this is the first time I've done anything like this. I really like this work by Terasu, but it seems like nobody wants to translate it. I used an AI for the initial translation, then I rephrased a lot of stuff and retyped it into dialogue boxes over the Ai's text. I should also add I know nothing about Fate, so if anything seems wrong, I'm sorry. Enjoy!
n: [Artist CG] (Terasu MC) Karudea o nottotta otoko ni kenj≈çmono to shite sashidasa reta guda-ko to sonogo no Hiroshi jinrui-shi (English)
